```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

import yaml, pathlib, html as _html

p       = yaml.safe_load(pathlib.Path("data/profile.yml").read_text())
contact = p["contact"]
about   = p["about"]

def e(s): return _html.escape(str(s))

# ── Hero ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
print("""
<section class="hero container-xl">
<div class="hero-layout">
<div class="hero-text">
<p class="hero-greeting">Hi, I'm</p>
<h1 class="hero-name">Alicia Alcaide</h1>
<p class="hero-tagline">Senior Data Analyst · AI Enthusiast · University Lecturer</p>
<p class="hero-bio">
I turn data into decisions — and complexity into clarity.
\n With 6+ years working across global teams, I help organizations unlock the real value hidden in their data, combining technical depth with a sharp business mindset.
\n Always learning. Always curious. Always looking for the next challenge.</p>
<div class="ctas">
<a href="blog/index.html" class="btn-primary-custom">Read my writing</a>
<a href="#about" class="btn-ghost-custom">About me &rarr;</a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="hero-avatar">
<img src="assets/images/profile.png" alt="Alicia Alcaide" onerror="this.style.display='none'">
</div>
</div>
</section>
""")

# ── About ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
paragraphs = "".join(f"<p>{e(para.strip())}</p>" for para in about.strip().split("\n\n"))
print(f"""
<div class="section-block section-block--alt" id="about">
<div class="container-xl">
<h2 class="section-heading">About me</h2>
{paragraphs}
</div>
</div>
""")

# ── Experience ────────────────────────────────────────────────────
items_html = ""
for exp in p["experiences"]:
    loc      = f'<span class="tl-loc"> &middot; {e(exp.get("location",""))}</span>' if exp.get("location") else ""
    details  = "".join(f"<li>{e(d)}</li>" for d in exp.get("details", []))
    det_html = f'<ul class="tl-details">{details}</ul>' if details else ""
    items_html += f"""
<div class="timeline-item">
<div class="tl-dot"></div>
<div>
<div class="tl-header"><h3 class="tl-role">{e(exp["role"])}</h3><span class="tl-time">{e(exp["time"])}</span></div>
<p class="tl-company">{e(exp["company"])}{loc}</p>
{det_html}
</div>
</div>"""

print(f"""
<div class="section-block container-xl">
<h2 class="section-heading">Experience</h2>
<div class="timeline">
{items_html}
</div>
</div>
""")

# ── Skills & Certifications ───────────────────────────────────────
skills_html = ""
for group in p["skills"]:
    tags = "".join(f'<span class="tag-pill">{e(item)}</span>' for item in group["items"])
    skills_html += f'<div class="skill-group"><p class="skill-cat">{e(group["category"])}</p><div class="skill-tags">{tags}</div></div>'

certs_html = ""
for cert in p["certifications"]:
    certs_html += f'<div class="cert-item"><span class="cert-name">{e(cert["name"])}</span><span class="cert-meta">{e(cert["issuer"])} &middot; {e(cert["date"])}</span></div>'

print(f"""
<div class="section-block section-block--alt">
<div class="container-xl">
<div class="two-col-grid" style="display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:3rem;align-items:start;">
<div>
<h2 class="section-heading">Skills</h2>
{skills_html}
</div>
<div>
<h2 class="section-heading">Certifications</h2>
{certs_html}
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
""")

# ── Contact ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────
print(f"""
<div class="section-block container-xl" id="contact">
<h2 class="section-heading">Let's talk</h2>
<p style="color:var(--bs-secondary-color);margin-bottom:1.75rem;max-width:480px;">I'm always happy to connect &mdash; about data, teaching, or just a good conversation about technology.</p>
<div class="ctas">
<a href="mailto:{e(contact['email'])}" class="btn-primary-custom">Send an email</a>
<a href="https://linkedin.com/in/{e(contact['linkedin'])}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="btn-ghost-custom">LinkedIn &#x2197;</a>
</div>
</div>
""")
```
